channel.title: Real Webclient!
channel.description:
[b][size=20pt]This only explains how to get rid of the "X"![/size][/b]
Allright as many of you have seen the one and only webclient tut fails for most people. [b]Now i am not here to fix the downloading cache error or how to jar it.[/b] If you need help on Jaring or fixing the downloading cache error go to the other tut :D lolz
[b]First step:[/b] Have a website that lets you upload files into it. [b]Second step[/b] Be able to jar your client. (if when you double click it it takes you to the client, you did good :D) [b]Third step[/b] Upload the jar file to your site [b]Fourth step[/b] Now this might seem stupid but it worked for me :D Upload all .Class files + your cache folder sign folder and any other folder inside your client folder. (it worked for me so im just telling you what i did.) [b]Fifth Step[/b] (Not taking credits for this) Make a new .txt file and put this in it [code]<html> <title>WEBCLIENT NAME</title> <center><applet name="app" width="765" height="503" archive="JAR URL" code="client"> </applet></center> </html>[/code]
Change the webclient name to w/e you want and the JAR URL to wherever it is. The Jar URL is usually this www.EXAMPLEPAGE.com/WHATEVER_YOU_NAMED_YOUR_.TXT_FILE.php or .htm
or
www.EXAMPLEPAGE.com/EXAMPLE/WHATEVER_YOU_NAMED_YOUR_.TXT_FILE.php or .htm
*Note the top two URL's might not be your case After you are done with the .txt file rename it to WHATEVERYOUNAMEDIT.[b]htm[/b]
Hope this helps :D Post Feedback please as this has been my first Tut ever!!!
Credits: 98% me 2% whoever made the original webclient tut
I have only posted this here and in Rune Locus as andrew112 if anywhere else, it has been leeched.

item.title: Real Webclient!
item.dc:creator: @marc_is_hood marc is hood
item.description:
@marc_is_hood wrote:

THERE IS NO NEED FOR ANOTHER ONE OF THESE TUTORIALS! It may be a bit smaller but there are 4-5 tutorials on webclients already out there. And x10hosting is your best bet for a webclient. And you dont explain that you need to sign the jar so it wont have that “Connection error - retying in #” because you need to sign it so it wont do that. You have nothing in there that says anything about signing the jar.

Read full topic

item.title: Real Webclient!
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“Andrew1112, post:1, topic:182775”]www.EXAMPLEPAGE.com/WHATEVER_YOU_NAMED_YOUR_.TXT_FILE.php or .htm

or

www.EXAMPLEPAGE.com/EXAMPLE/WHATEVER_YOU_NAMED_YOUR_.TXT_FILE.php or .htm[/quote]
Rofl. Even if you don’t know HTML or php you should know that won’t work. It needs the DIRECT link to the jar file. So

www.example.com/webclient.jar/

Then you make a HTML page that includes the jar… Dumbass.

Read full topic

item.title: Real Webclient!
item.dc:creator: @Andrew1112 Andrew1112
item.description:
@Andrew1112 wrote:

[size=20pt]This only explains how to get rid of the “X”![/size]

Allright as many of you have seen the one and only webclient tut fails for most people. Now i am not here to fix the downloading cache error or how to jar it. If you need help on Jaring or fixing the downloading cache error go to the other tut lolz

First step:
Have a website that lets you upload files into it.
Second step
Be able to jar your client. (if when you double click it it takes you to the client, you did good :D)
Third step
Upload the jar file to your site
Fourth step
Now this might seem stupid but it worked for me
Upload all .Class files + your cache folder sign folder and any other folder inside your client folder. (it worked for me so im just telling you what i did.)
Fifth Step
(Not taking credits for this)
Make a new .txt file and put this in it

[code]

WEBCLIENT NAME [/code]

Change the webclient name to w/e you want and the JAR URL to wherever it is.
The Jar URL is usually this
www.EXAMPLEPAGE.com/WHATEVER_YOU_NAMED_YOUR_.TXT_FILE.php or .htm

or

www.EXAMPLEPAGE.com/EXAMPLE/WHATEVER_YOU_NAMED_YOUR_.TXT_FILE.php or .htm

*Note the top two URL’s might not be your case
After you are done with the .txt file rename it to WHATEVERYOUNAMEDIT.htm

Hope this helps Post Feedback please as this has been my first Tut ever!!!

Credits: 98% me
2% whoever made the original webclient tut

I have only posted this here and in Rune Locus as andrew112 if anywhere else, it has been leeched.

Read full topic
